feed.title: Google Cloud: Apigee Operator for kubernetes
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Apigee Operator for kubernetes

entry.content: On January 7, 2026, we released an updated version of Apigee.
entry.summary: An updated version of Apigee was released on January 7, 2026. This release includes new features and improvements.
entry.title: Announcement: Apigee Updated

entry.content: | Bug ID | Description | | --- | --- | | 471150886, 471150271, 471150102, 426783172 | Security fixes for the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes. This addresses the following vulnerabilities: * CVE-2025-55163 * CVE-2025-67735 * CVE-2025-58057 * CVE-2025-58056 |
entry.summary: Security fixes are now available for the Apigee Operator for Kubernetes, addressing multiple critical vulnerabilities including CVE-2025-55163, CVE-2025-67735, CVE-2025-58057, and CVE-2025-58056. Applying these updates is recommended to protect your environment.
entry.title: Security: Apigee Operator Security Updates

entry.content: The Apigee Operator for Kubernetes version 1.1.1 is now available.
entry.summary: The Apigee Operator for Kubernetes version 1.1.1 has been released. This update is now available for all users.
entry.title: Feature: Apigee Operator 1.1.1 Released
